admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
subsc: Flood protection,Central government administration,Sub-national government administration
trustfund:
TF025771-PHRD-YANGTZE FLOOD CONTROL
            PROJECT (BANK-EXECUTED),TF039652-CHINA - YANGTZE DIKE
            STRENGTHENING PROJECT,TF039595-CHINA - YANGTZE DIKE
            STRENGTHENING PROJECT,TF039205-CHINA - YANGTZE FLOOD CONTROL PROJECT,TF039204-CHINA - YANGTZE FLOOD CONTROL PROJECT,TF026173-PHRD-YANGTZE FLOOD CONTROL
            PROJECT (RECIPIENT-EXECUTED)

abstracts.cdata!:
The Yangtze Dike Strengthening Project
            aims to enhance the protection of the river bank against
            erosion and to improve critical sections of existing main
            dikes along the banks of the mid-Yantgze River in Hunan and
            Hubei Provinces, thus protecting the properties and lives
            behind the dikes against floods. There are eight project
            components: 1) River bank and dike fountain seepage
            protection will support river protection works. 2) Dike
            strengthening for Hubei and Hunan Provinces will support
            dike rehabilitation and seepage control, and cross-dike
            structures rehabilitation and replacement. 3) Dike
            monitoring and river modeling will set up a computerized
            system to monitor the seepage through the dike and
            settlement/deformation of the dike. 4) Equipment for dike
            maintenance will provide modern equipment for dike
            maintenance. 5) Resettlement will implement various housing
            and economic restoration measures to accommodate the 10,958
            families affected. 6) Environmental management will support
            environmental measures detailed in the Environmental
            Management Plan. 7) Engineering and project management
            provides for the preparation of final designs and bidding
            documentation of the project works and construction
            supervision. 8) Institutional development, and flood
            prevention and disaster mitigation will provide technical
            assistance and training.
